participant_1.name: Isabella
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, enjoys exploring new cuisines and cultures.
participant_1.background: i am a descendant of christopher columbus. i am an art major in college. i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and playful, loves to have fun and is passionate about music.
participant_2.background: i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i am in the third grade.
